node.name: Adichatz - Building RCP application easily
node.shortdescription:
Adichatz is a open source framework designed for quickly developping Eclipse RCP applications relating to SQL database objects in JSE or JEE Context.
A few minutes, after having installed Adichatz plugins, you can use and easily customize editors managing objects of your database schema.
Adichatz takes charge of consistency, databinding, validation process, lazy fetches and optimization of the communication with the application server or the database.
XML files describes your editors. Change on these files change the behavior of the editor.Adichatz is a open source framework designed for quickly developping Eclipse editors relating to SQL database objects in JSE or JEE Context.
A few minutes, after having installed Adichatz plugins, you can use and easily customize editors managing objects of your database schema.
Adichatz takes charge of consistency, databinding, validation process, lazy fetches and optimization of the communication with the application server or the database.
XML files describes your editors. Change on these files change the behavior of the editor.
